publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5468 Stewart Stevenson: The Loch Ryan Port (Harbour Empowerment) Order 2009—That the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee recommends that the Loch Ryan Port (Harbour Empowerment) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*
